details.title: Edge Computing
details.description: I work on our proposed MicroLambda Edge Setup for AMELIA team for Machine learning & Mixed Reality applications.

details.title: Database & Pub-Sub
details.description: I also work on the database setup for Lambda Invocation, efficiency physioLogical siganl data storation, publish-subscribe for computation output

details.title: iOS 360 Gear Manager
details.description: Worked on Gear 360 team to develop iOS App for Samsung 360 degree Camera. Particularly, I was working on the stitching engine & connectivity of 360 Camera
